Education and memberships

Education

Jane is actively involved in knowledge-sharing with key groups in her field. She regularly presents on elderly client law to local care homes. She has also spoken at presentations for the Good Care Group (via Symponia), and Sunrise residential home in Sevenoaks.

Jane presented to a national catastrophic injury panel of leading defendant litigators in May 2014 on the direct recommendation of national insurer, Ageas.

Professional accreditations

JE Bennett are ranked in the prestigious Legal 500 rankings for Court of Protection and Jane Bennett has been named as a recommended lawyer.

Our Managing Director and Senior Partner, Jane Bennett, is a member of the Court of Protectionâ€™s national panel of professional deputies.

Jane undertook Part 1, STEP Advanced Certificate in Advising Vulnerable Clients in April 2015, and Part 2 in September.

Professional memberships

Jane is a full professional member of Solicitors for the Elderly and a lifelong member of Headway.
